events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your experience and resume details.
A recruiter specialized in engineering positions has been assigned to assist you through the hiring process.
During the initial screening, you demonstrated relevant knowledge and competencies for the software engineering role.
You responded promptly to our screening questions, showing eagerness and clear communication skills.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-08T15:00:00Z to assess your engineering skills in depth.
